name: YUT YUT
detailed_description:
Do You Like TANKS?

If the answer is yes, Hop in your Trusty Rusty and Blast your way through all 120 levels of this low stakes high action TANK adventure! If the answer is no, feel free to pretend that they're just fat cars with guns.

Are You Up to the Task?

Start off with training wheels in world one before the real TANKS show up to crash your party. Fight, Observe and Strategize your way through challenging new TANKS as you work your way through each world to defeat the boss.

Make Your own Levels

Use the intuitive Level design system to make your own unique levels or recreate specific parts of challenging levels to help you Strategize. Once you defeat a new type of enemy TANK in the campaign it will be unlocked in the Sandbox Mode for use in your custom levels. Defeat bosses to unlock up to five custom level slots.

Key Features

  • 19 Unique enemy types
  • 7 Different playable tanks
  • 5 Worlds
  • 5 Bosses
  • 120 Levels
  • Intuitive Sandbox mode
  • 5 Hidden minigames

short_description: YUT YUT is a game about TANKS containing TANKS in which many TANKS die. Fight through this TANKy TANK game to face your mortal TANK enemy and reclaim your TANK village's lost cabbage god.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 32 or 64 bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: 1-2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: On board will likely be suffucient
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64 bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
